feels.name: Acceptance
feels.quote: But the time of his justification has now come.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: Your true whale-hunter is as much a savage as an Iroquois. I myself am a savage, owning no allegiance but to the King of the Cannibals; and ready at any moment to rebel against him.

causedBy.name: Long exile from Christendom and civilization

Places.name: London docks
Places.description: A place where a crippled beggar holds up a painted board.

Events.name: Long exile from Christendom and civilization
